message: I've spent some time reading command.py and can't really see what it's trying to do.
So how do I actually run the program?
I've set up the example and the commands give me one of two errors:

# kokki config.yaml web
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/bin/kokki", line 6, in <module>
    main()
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.6/dist-packages/kokki/command.py", line 62, in main
    with open(fname, "rb") as fp:
IOError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'kitchen.py'

# kokki -f ~/src/kokki/tests/ test
Function for role 'test' not found in config
